outputs.output_descr:
Transboundary Dialogue and Cooperation in the Ili-Balkhash River Basin 
- Policy and Institutional Analysis 
- Support to Bilateral Cooperation and Joint Activities
- Support to bilateral commission and framework agreements
- Coordinating Water Management Activities in the Basin, Stakeholder Engagement

Developing and implementing IWRM Strategies in Kyrgyzstan: 
- Support to IWRM implementation
- Kyrgyz Irrigation Demonstration  Projects
- Kyrgyz Irrigation Investment Strategies, Plans and Financial Policies
- Kyrgyz Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Demonstration  Project 
- Small Transboundary Sub-basin management 
- Participatory IRBM Processes
- IRBM Institutional Reforms

Regional Dialogue, IWRM Governance and Sector Capacity Building:
- Project Management and Coordination - providing adequate technical and logistical support and backstopping to PIUs and project partners
- Regional IWRM Dialogue and Water Governance - supporting IWRM activities on the regional level, as well as enabling regional structures and institutions to perform their IWRM activities with support of  relevant tools and mechanisms
- Sector Capacity Building - addressing capacity building needs, establish and implement a comprehensive capacity building roadmap  in close coordination  and jointly where appropriate- with other partners and projects as to secure needed regional competency in all relevant domains, especially for the project beneficiaries and partners in view of their performance and implementation of their IWRM roles and functions. 
- Addressing Climate Change via IWRM process and mechanisms - resulting in vulnerability assessments, elaboration of climate-related development scenarios, regional discussions on the priority issues, and propose strategies and plans for addressing climate change in water management

Developing and implementing IWRM Strategies in Tajikistan:
- Support to IWRM development
- Tajik Irrigation Demonstration  Projects 
- Tajik Irrigation Investment Strategies, Plans and Financial Policies
- Tajik Rural Water Supply and Sanitation (RWSS) Demonstration  Project 
- Tajik Rural Water Supply and Sanitation (RWSS) Investment Strategies, Plans and Financial Policies
- Tajik Small-scale Hydropower (SSH) Investment Strategies, Plans and Financial Policies
- Small Transboundary Sub-basin management 
- Participatory International River Basin Management Processes
- International River Basin Management Institutional Support

project_title: Promoting IWRM and Fostering Transbound. Dialogue in CA
